summary: No explicit requirements or acceptance criteria were provided in the BuildRequest. The diff modifies the Motoko backend to add a readings data model and related endpoints, and updates project_state.json metadata.

hallucinated_features.description: Implemented sensor/telemetry-style readings storage with add/get endpoints (Reading/ReadingDTO, addReading, getAllReadings, getLatestReading, DataResponse builders).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest specifies no requirements; these backend features are newly introduced without a corresponding request.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated project_state.json flags and notes (e.g., isFixRequest=true, frontend canister ID linking notes).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided that requested project state metadata changes or frontend linking guidance.
